Question: Shenzhen EPT Battery Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen EPT Battery Co., Ltd.

Product: Rechargeable Batteries

- Founded in 2001, Shenzhen EPT Battery Co., Ltd. specializes in research, production, and marketing of environmentally friendly rechargeable batteries, including Ni-MH and various Li-ion technology batteries and battery pack products.
- The company has an independent R&D center equipped with a full set of test equipment for battery physical, chemical characteristics, electrochemistry, and battery application performance.
- Shenzhen EPT Battery Co., Ltd. is an ISO9001:2000 certified company and complies with various certifications and standards such as CE, UL, RoHS, TUV, LGA, SVHC, and PAHs.
- The company has a daily production capacity of 500,000 pieces and invests more than 6.3% of its total turnover each year in R&D projects.
- Shenzhen EPT Battery Co., Ltd. has successfully become the leading OEM/ODM supplier and partner of many domestic and international well-known companies.

Please note that the company also has a factory area of more than 15,000 sq. meters and its daily production capacity is up to 500,000 pcs.
Summary_cn:
深圳亿派特电池有限公司。

产品：可充电电池。

- 成立于2001年，深圳亿派特电池有限公司专注于环保可充电电池的研究、生产和市场推广，包括镍氢电池、各种锂离子技术电池和电池组产品。
- 公司设有独立的研发中心，配备完整的电池物理、化学特性、电化学和电池应用性能测试设备。
- 深圳亿派特电池有限公司是ISO9001:2000认证企业，符合CE、UL、RoHS、TUV、LGA、SVHC和PAHs等各种认证和标准。
- 公司日产能达到50万件，每年将公司总营业额的6.3%以上投入研发项目。
- 深圳亿派特电池有限公司已成功成为许多国内外知名公司的主要OEM/ODM供应商和合作伙伴。

请注意，该公司还拥有超过15,000平方米的厂区，日产能高达50万件。
